name: 黃正民
objective:
電腦視覺簡介及其應用
影像形成
偵測與配對
影像分割
以特徵為基礎的定位
運動推論結構
運動估計
影像縫合
計算攝影學
立體對應
三維重建
影像辨識
schedule:
Week 1. Introduction
Week 2. Image Formation
Week 3. Thresholding and Segmentation
Week 4. Region Analysis
Week 5. Statistical Pattern Recognition
Week 6. Mathematical Morphological Processing
Week 7. Conditioning and Labeling
Week 8. Facet Model and Texture Analysis
Week 9. Midterm Exam
Week 10. Object Models
Week 11. Detection and Matching
Week 12. Segmentation
Week 13. Feature-Based Alignment
Week 14. Structure from Motion, Motion Estimation
Week 15. Image Stitching, Stereo Correspondence, 3D Reconstruction
Week 16. Recognition
Week 17. Presentation of Final Project
Week 18. Presentation of Final Project
scorePolicy:
Homework (with C programming)                                70%
Midterm Exam (closed book)                                   10%
Final Project                                                20%
materials:
-Textbook
Richard Szeliski, Computer Vision: Algorithms and Applications, 2010.
-Reference
D. A. Forsyth and John Ponce, Computer Vision: A Modern Approach, Pearson Education, 2003.
Richard Hartley and Andrew Zisserman, Multiple View Geometry in Computer Vision, 2nd ed, Cambridge University Press, March 2004.
